channel.title: Book Notes - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: These are the summaries and notes of books I have read. These notes are the result of wanting to further process books and retain information. After years of reading books one time and then forgetting most of them. My current reading process Give the book a quick read through. Read the book a second time, highlighting anything I want to remember along the way. Read through highlights and try to distill key points in my own words, or just writing down words straight from the book that I want to remember.
